ygData.subject: Re: attachments disabled
ygData.msgSnippet: It s an oversight that is readily forgiven on my part.  Course, I don t open attachments......heh.  Don t beat yourself up; there s enough people out there in
ygData.messageBody:
It's an oversight that is readily forgiven on my part. Course, I don't open
attachments......heh. Don't beat yourself up; there's enough people out there in the Real
World who are all too willing to do it for ya. <smiles>
Sara, Povar

truffle@... wrote:

> From: truffle@...
>
> I've disabled attachments on the mailing list. Sorry that I didn't know to do so before!
